message: Hi Bob, I'm looking to sell this product which I believe would be very valuable to you. I'm asking for $18,000. What do you think?
Hello Alice, I appreciate the offer, but I can't justify spending $18,000 on this product. I'm willing to pay up to $12,000 for it. Could we meet somewhere in between?
Hi Bob, I understand your position. However, the product is worth significantly more to me than that. Could you meet me at $15,000?

Hello Alice, I appreciate your response. While I understand the value of the product to you, I still feel that $12,000 is a fair price considering my budget constraints. Would you be willing to meet me halfway?
